item.title: reactiveVal(ues)
item.description: Letâ€™s say we wish to toggle between 2 objects and assign either one of them to 1 common reactive value. For an instance, we have a plot output and 2 buttons, * when button one is pressed, plot displays a histogram of a normal distribution, * when button two is pressed, plot displays a histogram of a uniform distribution. How can we do that? Use reactiveVal or reactiveValues. reactiveVal is very similar to reactiveValues, except that the former is for a single reactive value (like a variable).
